import React from 'react'; import { Calendar, Thermometer, Droplets, Wind } from 'lucide-react'; const WeatherCard = ({ weather, location }) => { if (!weather || !weather.forecast) { return (

Weather Forecast

Weather data not available

); } const formatDate = (dateString) => { const date = new Date(dateString); return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'short', month: 'short', day: 'numeric' }); }; const getWeatherIcon = (iconCode) => { const iconMap = { '01d': '‚òÄÔ∏è', '01n': 'üåô', '02d': '‚õÖ', '02n': '‚òÅÔ∏è', '03d': '‚òÅÔ∏è', '03n': '‚òÅÔ∏è', '04d': '‚òÅÔ∏è', '04n': '‚òÅÔ∏è', '09d': 'üåßÔ∏è', '09n': 'üåßÔ∏è', '10d': 'üå¶Ô∏è', '10n': 'üåßÔ∏è', '11d': '‚õàÔ∏è', '11n': '‚õàÔ∏è', '13d': '‚ùÑÔ∏è', '13n': '‚ùÑÔ∏è', '50d': 'üå´Ô∏è', '50n': 'üå´Ô∏è' }; return iconMap[iconCode] || 'üå§Ô∏è'; }; return (

Weather Forecast

{location && (

{location.name}, {location.country}

)}
{weather.forecast.map((day, index) => (
{formatDate(day.date)}
{getWeatherIcon(day.icon)}
High
{Math.round(day.temperature.max)}¬∞C
Low
{Math.round(day.temperature.min)}¬∞C
Rain
{Math.round(day.precipitation)}%
Wind
{day.windSpeed} m/s

{day.description}

))}
); }; export default WeatherCard;
